name: The Other Dream
description:
This Game was made in RPG  Maker Mv

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thank you for taking the time to play my game.

This game was made in the spawn of a few days, it’s my first project so I wanted it to 

make it small and simple, hopefully, in the future, I can make something a little more complex and with a greater story.

Please don’t forget to save the game when you see fit, some puzzles will cause a game over screen.

Interact with objects! Maybe they make something important to tell…

And last but not least: Have fun!!

-Sxugaryx
